title: Code Sprint
description: An intense coding challenge that tests your problem-solving skills and speed.
rules: Code must be submitted through the platform.

title: Hackathon Blitz
description: Build innovative solutions to real-world problems in a limited time.
rules: Code should be uploaded to GitHub.

title: Tech Quiz
description: Test your knowledge on various topics in tech with a challenging quiz.
rules: No use of electronic devices during the quiz.

title: Game Masters
description: Compete in a series of popular online games to prove your gaming skills.
rules: Games will be announced on the day of the event.
No cheating or exploiting game bugs.

title: Robo Race
description: Build and race your robots to complete various tasks in the shortest time possible.
rules: Robots must be built from scratch.
Each task has a time limit.
Points are deducted for each penalty.

title: Cyber Siege
description: Test your cybersecurity skills in a CTF competition with challenging scenarios.
rules: No external help or tools allowed.

title: AI Exploration
description: A workshop that delves into AI/ML models and their real-world applications.
rules: Bring your laptop with Python installed.

title: Sky High
description: Race your custom drones through an obstacle course to reach the finish line.
rules: Drones must be registered with event organizers.
Each round has a time limit.

title: Design Sprint
description: Showcase your design skills by creating a unique UI/UX solution in a limited time.
rules: Submissions must include wireframes and mockups.

title: The Future of Blockchain
description: An engaging tech talk discussing the potential and challenges of blockchain technology.

title: Lens Masters
description: Capture the essence of tech innovation through your camera lens in this contest.
rules: Photos must be original and unedited.
Each participant can submit up to 3 photos.
